resources.string: It may take a while to\ndownload all the information
You are not yet checked in!
Turn on bluetooth and location services.\nDoesn\'t work? Scan the QR code below\nat the help desk.
Show this ticket for the guards and go in to\nthe exhibition. Do not block the entrance,\nwait for your friends after the checkout.
Click on the ticket to go to the main menu
